channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data intelligence (datacatalog) has changed the description of the plan named essentials
item.description:
*before*: The Essentials plan includes core capabilities to automatically discover, profile, enrich, analyze data lineage and quality, and share data products as you begin to establish a data-centric organization.
This plan is restricted to the above capabilities and quantities.
Capacity Unit Hours are used in metadata import, metadata enrichment and data preparation., *after*: The Essentials plan includes core capabilities to automatically discover, profile, enrich, analyze data lineage and quality, and share data products as you begin to establish a data-centric organization. Limited access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is included (Sample Terms and Cross Industry only).
This plan is restricted to the above capabilities and quantities.
Details on feature differences are available in documentation under the section "Feature differences between watsonx.data intelligence plans".
To enable unstructured data governance capabilities (where available), the Client must separately acquire the following cloud services: IBM watsonx.ai Studio as a Service, IBM watsonx.ai Runtime as a Service, IBM watsonx.data integration as a Service and IBM watsonx.data as a Service.
To enable advanced profiling and key relationship analysis capabilities, the Client must separately acquire one of the following cloud services: IBM DataStage as a Service or IBM watsonx.data integration as a Service.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data intelligence (datacatalog) has changed the description of the plan named premium
item.description:
*before*: The Premium plan provides a comprehensive set of tools for advanced data discovery, cataloging, governance, quality, lineage and data product hub, augmented by Gen AI. Access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is also included. To enable unstructured data governance capabilities (where available), you must separately acquire the following services: watsonx.ai Studio, watsonx.ai Runtime, watsonx.data integration and watsonx.data.
This plan offers the flexibility to use the Resource Units for any of the included capabilities., *after*: The Premium plan provides a comprehensive set of tools for advanced data discovery, cataloging, governance, quality, lineage and data product hub, augmented by Gen AI. Access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is also included.
This plan offers the flexibility to use the Resource Units for any of the included capabilities.
Details on feature differences are available in documentation under the section "Feature differences between watsonx.data intelligence plans".
To enable unstructured data governance capabilities (where available), the Client must separately acquire the following cloud services: IBM watsonx.ai Studio as a Service, IBM watsonx.ai Runtime as a Service, IBM watsonx.data integration as a Service and IBM watsonx.data as a Service.
To enable data quality definitions and rules, advanced profiling and key relationship analysis capabilities, the Client must separately acquire one of the following cloud services: IBM DataStage as a Service or IBM watsonx.data integration as a Service.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data intelligence (datacatalog) has a new plan named standard-v3
item.description:
The Standard plan includes core capabilities with enhanced entitlement limits in data governance, quality, lineage and data product hub. Full access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is also included.
This plan is restricted to the above capabilities and quantities.
Details on feature differences are available in documentation under the section "Feature differences between watsonx.data intelligence plans".
To enable unstructured data governance capabilities (where available), the Client must separately acquire the following cloud services: IBM watsonx.ai Studio as a Service, IBM watsonx.ai Runtime as a Service, IBM watsonx.data integration as a Service and IBM watsonx.data as a Service.
To enable data quality definitions and rules, advanced profiling and key relationship analysis capabilities, the Client must separately acquire one of the following cloud services: IBM DataStage as a Service or IBM watsonx.data integration as a Service.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.data intelligence (datacatalog) has changed the description of the plan named trial
item.description:
*before*: The Trial plan provides you with a free 30-day trial of watsonx.data intelligence to explore the full set of integrated and AI-powered capabilities to deliver trusted data to support your business and AI initiatives.
This plan is restricted to the above capabilities and quantities.
Capacity Unit Hours are used in metadata import, metadata enrichment and data preparation.
To enable unstructured data governance capabilities (where available), you must separately acquire the following services: watsonx.ai Studio, watsonx.ai Runtime, watsonx.data integration and watsonx.data.
**Trial plan services, including all data and assets, are deleted after 30 days.**, *after*: The Trial plan provides you with a free 30-day trial of watsonx.data intelligence to explore the full set of integrated and AI-powered capabilities to deliver trusted data to support your business and AI initiatives. Limited access to IBM Knowledge Accelerators is included (Sample Terms only).
This plan is restricted to the above capabilities and quantities.
Details on feature differences are available in documentation under the section "Feature differences between watsonx.data intelligence plans".
To enable unstructured data governance capabilities (where available), the Client must separately acquire the following cloud services: IBM watsonx.ai Studio as a Service, IBM watsonx.ai Runtime as a Service, IBM watsonx.data integration as a Service and IBM watsonx.data as a Service.
To enable data quality definitions and rules, advanced profiling and key relationship analysis capabilities, the Client must separately acquire one of the following cloud services: IBM DataStage as a Service or IBM watsonx.data integration as a Service.
**Trial plan services, including all data and assets, are deleted after 30 days.**
